tasks.title: Implement Tool Registry and Auto-Discovery
tasks.description: Create tools/registry.py with ToolRegistry class for auto-discovery of tools from agentic_v2.tools.builtin package. Implement load_builtin_tools() method that scans and registers all BaseTool subclasses from builtin module.

tasks.title: Create Core Agent Contracts and Schemas
tasks.description: Implement contracts/agent_contracts.py with Pydantic v2 schemas for specific agent roles (ArchitectInput/Output, CoderInput/Output, ReviewerInput/Output). All schemas must use extra='forbid' validation.

tasks.title: Set Up Test Infrastructure with Tier Markers
tasks.description: Create tests/conftest.py with pytest configuration and fixtures for temporary directories. Implement test discovery with @pytest.mark.tier0, @pytest.mark.tier1 markers. Create tests/test_contracts.py for message and contract validation.

tasks.title: Implement Additional Tier-0 Utility Tools
tasks.description: Add more builtin tier-0 tools: DirectoryCreateTool, TextExtractTool, and YamlParseTool. These tools should require no LLM calls and operate purely on file system and data transformations.

notes: Iteration 2 focuses on completing Phase 1 deliverables: tool registry, agent contracts, test infrastructure, and additional tier-0 tools. Tasks are grouped to allow parallel development of the tooling system and testing framework.
